name: Create Linear issue from Slack message
description: Monitors Slack messages for specific trigger keywords like '/create-issue' and automatically creates a corresponding Linear issue. The workflow extracts the message content, formats it as an issue title and description, and creates the issue in your configured Linear team. This enables quick issue creation directly from Slack conversations without switching contexts.

config.note: Configure this workflow to trigger from Slack webhooks. Set up Slack event subscriptions to receive message events and point them to your webhook endpoint.
